headline: Is Fortive (FTV) Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Softness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Fortive's current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you weigh what you are paying against what you are getting. Fortive's share price last closed at US$55.21, with returns of 0.0% over 7 days, 2.9% over 30 days, a 0.3% decline year to date, and a 4.1% decline over 1 year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 10.7% and 6.1% respectively. These mixed return numbers put the spotlight on what might be...
